Synopsis:
Based on the latest novel by bestselling author Nicholas Sparks ("The path of love," "The Notebook") THE LAST SONG (THE LAST SONG) develops in a small coastal town in southern United States. There, a father until now been present (GREG KINNEAR) has the opportunity to spend the summer with his daughter (Miley Cyrus), a teenager quite hostile to which he would have liked to stay in New York. Try connecting with her through all they have in common: music. This is a story about family, friendship, secrets and salvation, as well as first love and second chances. The film is directed by Julie Anne Robinson based on a screenplay by Sparks & Jeff Van Wie.

Production notes:
"The Last Song" is the book No 15 issued by the best-selling author Nicholas Sparks. Other books are successful Sparks "The Notebook", "The Message" and "Nights in Rodanthe." Although several of his novels have been made into a film, "The Last Song" is the first to make the leap to the big screen the same year of publication.
